response: "{ \"title\": \"Sum of Divisors\", \"description\": \"Given an integer n, calculate the sum of all its divisors. The function should return 0 if there are no divisors.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef sum_of_divisors(n: int) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `n` (int): A positive integer.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the sum of all divisors of the input number, excluding the number itself. If there are no divisors, returns 0.\\n\", \"code\": \"def sum_of_divisors(n: int) -> int:\\n    def is_divisor(d: int) -> bool:\\n        return n % d == 0\\n    sum = 0\\n    for i in range(1, n):\\n        if is_divisor(i):\\n            sum += i\\n    return sum\", \"tests\": [\"assert sum_of_divisors(6) == 6\", \"assert sum_of_divisors(10) == 18\", \"assert sum_of_divisors(13) == 0\", \"assert sum_of_divisors(24) == 28\"] }"
